channel.title: Isc2 on room362com
channel.description: Recent content in Isc2 on room362com

item.title: Wim Remes (@wimremes) for (ISC)2 Board of Directors
item.description:
I am way late to the game on this, but if you have a blog, a twitter handle, or even better (in this specific case) a CISSP, please support Wim Remes (@wimremes), as he has submitted to become a member of the (ISC)2 Board of Directors.

On twitter use the hashtag: #wim4board

Lets help the certifications, especially the one with so much corporate/gov acceptance, get better.

His petition: http://blog.remes-it.be/petition.html

Other supporters:

  • http://www.liquidmatrix.org/blog/2011/08/25/put-wim-remes-on-the-isc2-board/
  • http://www.mckeay.net/2011/08/25/support-change-at-the-isc2/
  • http://www.andrewhay.ca/archives/1783
  • http://blog.c22.cc/2011/08/25/make-your-voice-heard-change-isc%C2%B2-for-the-good/
  • http://blog.security4all.be/2011/08/help-improve-cissp-community-support.html
